body:
In this context it sound even more fucked up but here goes nothing: "Like Mother like Daughter", the "Tempers" & "Attitudes" part that is.
Good stuff, "2011", made me feels fucking old and even more miserable.
Futa Hoshina's amazing skill and talent at color and composition is so admirable.  No matter what the subject matter, I want to see every bit of her great work.
